Kuraichan17@... wrote:
 
>>The example of animes they gave was Roni Henshin....lol.
 
Oh, man!  I can just see some poor fool going out there and looking for that title.  :-D  If someone came up to me as a salesclerk in a video/anime store and gave me that title, I'd never be able to stop laughing. Or imagine the poor person going to the R's and finding Rurouni Kenshin and standing there wondering if it's the same...
 
Although, I guess the people who might be laughing hardest are kendo instructors who have people coming to them wanting to learn Hiten Mitsurugi Ryu or Gatotsu.  :-D
 
phil
